sentences.en: But while it gives fear and hope to all, it makes us sufficiently sensible that though there is no crime in its own nature inexpiable , yet a whole criminal life may be so;
sentences.cn: 但是它在给与人们恐惧和希望的同时，它使我们有足够的能力意识到虽然没有了不可救赎的罪，然而整个人生都可能是不可救赎的；

sentences.en: It is inexpiable because God's gift itself is of such transcendence and holiness that it cannot be paid off by finite animal beings such as we are.
sentences.cn: 无法抵赎的原因是上帝本身,的天赋是如此卓越和神圣,不能只通过有限生物来还清。

sentences.en: She regards this deed as such an inexpiable crime.
sentences.cn: 她认为这种行为是一种无可饶恕的罪行。

sentences.en: The Pagan religion indeed, which prohibited only some of the grosser crimes, and which stopped the hand but meddled not with the heart, might have crimes that were inexpiable ;
sentences.cn: 事实上异教只是禁止几种重大的罪行，它们阻止人的行为却不进入人的内心，所以很可能产生不可救赎的罪行；

words.tran_cn: 不能平息的,无同情心的,冷酷的,不屈服的,刚强的,残酷的
严重的,邪恶的,犯罪的,下流的
无法修复的,无法抵偿的,不可原谅的

trans.tran_cn: 不可抵偿的，不可赎的，不能平息的
